title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Developing Intercultural Communication Competence (ICC) via Instagram

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Communication Skills and Fundamental Social Media Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more virtual interaction scenarios with users from diverse cultural backgrounds using Instagram’s multimedia features.
Learners can compare and explain communication strategies reflecting cultural contexts of at least five countries through Instagram post analysis.
Learners can predict three or more potential misunderstandings in intercultural communication from a Global English (GE) perspective and propose solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
